name: Mr. Fluffer's Big Day
description:
Four years in a row, Douglas Dogsworth Sr. and his dog Mr. Fluffer have taken second place at the annual Sussex County dog show. This year, they put their hopes in "the awesome power of Satan" instead. Hijinks ensue.

Controls for Windows/HTML5:

  • Return to game title -> menu -> collection title -> Exit game - Escape
  • Select/Continue - A
  • Start - Enter
  • Running - S
  • Fullscreen (Windows) - CTRL+Return
  • Fullscreen (Web) - There's a small button

Controls for Dreamcast (and controller):

  • Return to game title -> menu -> collection title -> Exit game - A+B+X+Y+START (Standard Dreamcast return to title combo)
  • Select/Continue - A
  • Start - Start
  • Running - B

Additional notes:

  • Original release date: 12/03/2018
  • Source code is on github: http://github.com/CaptainDreamcast/Fluffer/

Thanks for playing!
